query:
SELECT m.id, m.nome, m.categoria, m.segmentacao, COUNT(c.id) as num_clientes
FROM mercados_unicos m
LEFT JOIN clientes c ON c.mercadoId = m.id
WHERE m.projectId = 1
GROUP BY m.id, m.nome, m.categoria, m.segmentacao
ORDER BY num_clientes DESC
LIMIT 10;
